value.title: Display selected value from slicer to Power BI Report
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a situation where we need to display the selected slicer value in the title of our Power BI visualization. Meaning, we need to set the Dynamic value for our Title column based on the slicer selection. How can we achieve this? How can we set dynamic title value for our Power BI visualization?

value.title: Draw X-Axis Constant Line for Power BI Line Charts
value.excerpt: Welcome to new Power BI Desktop Updates for March 2021. During this session, we will learn how we can draw Constant Line for X- Axis for Line Chart in Power BI. Microsoft recently introduce this new feature during March 2021 of Power BI Desktop update!   When we have date or number data type as columns,

value.title: Show Total in Stacked Bar and Column Chart in Power BI
value.excerpt: During this video, we will learn how we can show total value in a stacked bar chart and stacked column chart in Power BI. Earlier to show the total value in stacked bar chart and column chart we need to use some alternative approach. Now, with this new Power BI update, you can easily show Total by turn

value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
